trans-unit.source: Represents the method that handles a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Form.FormClosing"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: Rappresenta il metodo che gestisce un <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Form.FormClosing"> </xref> evento.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.FormClosing> event occurs just before a form is closed, either by the user, through the user interface (UI), or programmatically, through calls to methods such as <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.Close%2A> in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form> class, or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Application.Exit%2A> in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Application> class.
trans-unit.target: L' <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.FormClosing>evento si verifica immediatamente prima della chiusura di un form, da parte dell'utente, tramite l'interfaccia utente (UI), o a livello di programmazione tramite le chiamate ai metodi, ad esempio <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.Close%2A>in una <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>classe o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Application.Exit%2A>nella <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Application>classe.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Application> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Application.Exit%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.Close%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.FormClosing>

trans-unit.source: When you create a FormClosingEventHandler delegate, you identify the method that will handle the event.
trans-unit.target: Quando si crea un delegato FormClosingEventHandler, si identifica il metodo che gestirà l'evento.

trans-unit.source: To associate the event with your event handler, add an instance of the delegate to the event.
trans-unit.target: Per associare l'evento al gestore eventi, aggiungere un'istanza del delegato all'evento.

trans-unit.source: The event handler is called whenever the event occurs, unless you remove the delegate.
trans-unit.target: Il gestore eventi viene chiamato ogni volta che si verifica l'evento, a meno che non venga rimosso il delegato.

trans-unit.source: For more information about event-handler delegates, see [Events](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Per ulteriori informazioni sui delegati del gestore eventi, vedere [eventi](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
